s ɛ t b e ʁ j ɔ d k ɔ ɔ̃ s i d a a v ɛ k l ə m ɔ v m ɑ̃ d a n ɛ k s j ɔ̃ d ə l a b e n e t ʁ a s j ɔ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ n
l a b ʁ e n ɑ̃ s d y l ɔ d ɑ̃ n ɔ t ʁ b ɛ i s ə ʁ ɛ t a k t y ɛ l m ɑ̃ d ə d ø s ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ k ɑ̃ t ɔ̃ d i v i d y

s e n a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ n t œ̃ s y v ɛ k ə n ɔ n a v ɔ̃ n e v ɔ k e b l y n j œ ʁ t w a

t ʁ e d e ʁ i k b ɛ a k ɔ̃ s y b l y d y n s ɔ̃ k ɑ̃ t ɛ n d ə w ɔ ʁ ɡ ɛː j m n

i l a v w a n i n l ə v i l a v d ə ɔ k e s i t y e b l y n a n a ʁ ɛ s t

a ʁ ɛ t e

m a d a m l ɔː s i e t ɛ t ɔ̃ k a b a b l d ə t ɛ ʁ t ʁ ɛ s a j i ʁ ɑ̃ s ɔ̃ k œ ʁ œ̃ s ɔ v n i ʁ d y b a s e
s ə s w a ʁ s ɛ d i s t ʁ i b y s j ɔ̃ d ə k l a k
k ɛ l ɛ v ɔ t ʁ a d ʁ ɛ s
n a ʁ b a ʁ t ɛ s i t y e d ɑ̃ l a n ɔ n l ɔ̃ ɡ y i s t i k b a s k ɔ t ɔ n d ə n a v a ʁ
s ɔ̃ n ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ s a s e t ʁ ɔ b l l a b a k ɔ m a ʁ k e
ɛ l ʁ ə b ʁ ɑ̃ t ɑ̃ s y i t s e n a k t i v i t e n ɑ̃ n ɑ̃ t ʁ ə b ʁ i n d ɑ̃ l a k ɔ m y n i k a s j ɔ̃
m i n a m i d ɛ t a ɛ t a k s ɛ s i b l b a ʁ a v j ɔ̃
l e ɡ l i n ɛ s i t y e s y ʁ l a k ɔ m y n d ɔː d d ɑ̃ l ə d e b a ʁ t ə m ɑ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ s ɛ d e n a ʁ d ɛ n
s ɔ̃ s a t l i ø t y a m w a j ɔ̃ aː v l ə s j ɛ v d y n s ɛ n j ø ʁ i
v ə ʁ ə k ɔ n ɛ s a a l a s ɔ n ɛ t
l a m y n i k ɛ k ɔ̃ b a n e b a ʁ d a n a w ɔ l d œ n e l a t a t a ɡ ʁ a t i ɛ d ə t ʁ ɑ̃ s i s ɡ ʁ y m ɑ̃
i l a e t e e d i t œ ʁ a m ɛ ʁ k y ʁ d ə t ʁ ɑ̃ s m ɛ n ɔ̃ d e e d i s j ɔ̃ d i ʁ i v e b a ʁ s i m ɔ n ɡ a l i m a ʁ
d ə m j ɑ̃ v a s ɪ l iː v ɪ tm k ɔ t m ɔ b ɛ j a v ɛ b ɔ ʁ a s ɑ̃ d ɑ̃ k y s y k œ̃ b ɛ t a ʁ t a ʁ d ə k ʁ i m e

b a k ɔ m œ ʁ d ə t ɔ̃ e d ə t ʁ w a ɑ̃ ʁ ɔ t
a b ʁ ɛ l a m y t d ə ʁ a n s ɔ̃ s i ʁ d e s i d b ʁ a v m ɑ̃ d a l e s ə k ɔ ʁ i ʁ b a ʁ s ə l ɔ n
t a ə v l n ɛ l ə a m a ʁ k œ m ɑ̃ n ɔ̃ t a ʁ j a

v ə n ə s y i b a s yː ʁ k ə b ʁ e v w a ʁ y n k ɔ̃ t ʁ a v ɑ̃ s j ɔ̃ b ʁ ɔ t ɛ v s ø k ə v ɔ v ɔ l e b ʁ ɔ t e v e

i l a b a ʁ t ə n ɛ t a l a d i v i n j ɔ̃ d ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ t ʁ i

n ɔ̃ s ə l a s ə b ʁ ɔ d y i d ɑ̃ l ə k a d ʁ d ə b ʁ ɔ s e d y ʁ k i s ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ k a d ʁ e

l e b y l ɛ s ɔ̃ k l i n ɛ ʁ t a s ə ɡ ɔ̃ t ɔ ʁ d e b l ɛ j ɔ t t a s a b ɔ s t ɔ̃ s ɛ l t i k
l e t a b l i s m ɑ̃ k ɔ l e v j a l ɔ t ʁ d ə m y l t i b l n a k t i v i t e b ɔ ʁ t a v ɔ ʁ i n e l e b a n ɔ i s m ɑ̃ d ə s e n e t y d j ɑ̃
l ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ v e n j ɑ̃ e t ɛ l y m i d i t e k i b ɔ v ɛ d y ʁ e t ɔ l i v ɛ ʁ e ɑ̃ t ʁ ɛ n e l e m a l a d i

k ɔ m ɑ̃ s a l ɔ ʁ v ɛ ʁ l a d ø n j ɛ m b ɔ k l b a ʁ l ə b ʁ ə m j e b a s a v s y ʁ l a l i ɲ d a ʁ i v e
s ə l a n y k ə t ʁ a ʁ e v ɔ l t e l e d y b ɔ ʁ e l e ʁ i b e ʁ i d
ɛ l ɛ t a k s e s y ʁ y n i m a v ʁ i d e k a l e s ɔ̃ s b i ʁ ɑ̃ d e k ɔ d d y t e aː t ʁ
s ɛ t ɔ̃ t ʁ a k s j ɔ̃ t ɛ b a ʁ t i d e n ɔ̃ t ʁ a k s j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ s t a t a b l s ɑ̃ n ɔ̃ t ɛ ʁ s ɛ b s j ɔ̃ d y v e i k y l
d ə b l y l a k a ʁ ɛ n s ɛ v y a b l i k e œ̃ ʁ ə v ɛ t m ɑ̃ ɑ̃ s i l i k ɔ n
v i e m ɛ m v y y n t e m i n i s t ʁ ə t i l e œ̃ t ʁ a k t a y n t a m v w a l e

i l ɛ t a l e t y d d ɑ̃ l e n e k ɔ l b ɔ l ɔ n ɛ n

s ɔ̃ n ɔ̃ t e ʁ ɛ b ɔ ʁ d j a ɡ n ɔ s t i k e y n i b ɔ t i ʁ ɔ i d i t ʁ y s t ɛ n ɛ b a n e t a b l i

i l ɛ ɡ n i s t k w a t ɔ ʁ n s ɑ̃ t ʁ d i n i s j a s j ɔ̃ a l ɑ̃ s ɛ n j ə m ɑ̃ s y b e ʁ j œ ʁ ɑ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ s
ɡ y s t a v y v ɛ l a ʁ ɑ̃ b ɔ ʁ t e l a k ɔ̃ b e t i s j ɔ̃ m a l ɡ ʁ e y n b l ɛ s y ʁ a œ̃ t ɑ̃ d ɔ̃

n ɔ n ɔ l yː m

s ə d ɛ ʁ n j e d e a j œ ʁ ɛ n ɛ b a l j e a ɛ l e ʁ ɛ k s j ɔ̃ ɑ̃ b ʁ ɔ̃ s i b a t e d ə k ɛː ʁ n s i

m ɛ m l a b ə t i t b ɔ b y l a s j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ b a n e d ə t a n œ ʁ d ə t ɔ̃ t y ʁ j e n e d ə b ɛ m œ ʁ s i t ʁ ɔ v

m ɛ s ə l y i l a i l v i t ɔ s œ l d ɑ̃ d e n ɑ̃ d ʁ w a n w a ʁ k ɔ m œ̃ k ɔ l i m a s ɔ̃
y n b a ʁ ɔ̃ b ɔ ʁ t ɑ̃ t d e b a ʁ t i s i b ɑ̃ n a ɛ l ɑ̃ k ɛ t d ə ɛ l ɔ b s ɛ ʁ v a t w a ʁ d ə l a l ɑ̃ ɡ b ʁ ə t ɔ n

s ɔ̃ m ɛ t l j ø ɛ l a v i l d ə ɡ ɔ b a l ɡ ɑ̃ v

m a ʁ i s n ə k ɔ̃ t a k y n b ʁ a t i k l i s t e a ʁ ə v i s t ʁ d e m ɛ j œ ʁ b ʁ a t i k d ə s a v ɡ a ʁ d
i l ɛ t ɑ̃ b l w a j e k ɔ m d ɛ s i n a t œ ʁ ɔ̃ d y s t ʁ i ɛ l b a ʁ l a s ɔ s j e t e n a s j ɔ n a l d e ɡ a n d y s y d ɔ ɛ s t

a v n y t ɛ ʁ n ɑ̃ b ə n ɛ a n y m e ʁ a d i s ɛ t

k a ʁ ɑ̃ t k a t ʁ ʁ y d ə b a s k i n e ʁ a t ʁ w a s ɑ̃ m ɔ̃ t l y s ɔ̃
l ə t l i k ɑ̃ v i n a v d ə ʁ a b e l e n ɛ s t a m i n ɛ n a v a b œ ʁ b ɔ ʁ ɡ ʁ ɔ̃ b e s y ʁ d e b ʁ i k ɛ

v w a j ɑ̃ k ə s ə l y i s i k ʁ ɔ̃ l ə d j a b l i l s ə m ɛ t a s ɔ̃ s ɛ ʁ v i s
l ə t ɔ̃ d ə l ɔ v ʁ a v ɛ v i t v w a ʁ l a b i d ɛ ʁ l ə s t i l b a ʁ t i k y l j ɛ ʁ m ɑ̃ k ʁ y e m a t w a j ɑ̃

s e ɛ d ə l a k ɔ̃ t a b i l i t e d e e b i s j e

m l ɔ̃ ɡ a s ə s ɛ ʁ a b ɔ̃ d a m ɑ̃ d e ɔ n ɔ m a t ɔ b e n e t ʁ ɑ̃ v n e d e ɔ̃ t ɛ ʁ v ɛ k s j ɔ̃ t ʁ ɑ̃ s t i ɡ y ʁ e

a v n y d ə d ə k a n v i l a n y m e ʁ a t ʁ ɑ̃ t e œ̃
i ɑ̃ n a t e i l ɑ̃ k ɔ ʁ
a k i ɛ s ə m ɑ̃ t a
s ə l a t ɔ̃ k s j ɔ n b y i s k ə b ʁ ɔ k t i n i b a ʁ l y i ɔ v ʁ i ʁ s ɔ̃ k œ ʁ
a t w a l e v ɔ i s ɑ̃ s
b ʁ ɔ t i t ɑ̃ d y n ɛ s k a b a d d ə ʁ i b a d j e t ɔ m ʁ ø ʁ e v ɛ j ɑ̃ v ɛ l b ɔ ʁ l y i ʁ e i t e ʁ e s a t l a m
ɔ ʁ t ɔ t l e k a t n ə ʁ e b ɔ̃ d b a n i m m e d j a t m ɑ̃ ɛ l t ʁ ɛ n b a ʁ t w a n a l ə t ɛ ʁ
ɑ̃ n ɛ s b a ɲ l e k ɔ ʁ œ ʁ b ɔ j k ɔ t l a k ɔ ʁ s a l a s y i t d ə l a t ɛ ʁ b y ɛ ʁ t a
v ə n ə ʁ ɛ n ɔ n b a s ɔ ɛ l ɑ̃ ɡ l d e n a b œ l m ɛ s ɔ s ə l y i d e l w a j e

l e d i t i s ɛ t ɔ̃ s k ʁ i a l ɔ̃ v ɑ̃ t ɛ ʁ v e n e ʁ a l d y b a t ʁ i m w a n k y l t y ʁ ɛ l

l e d y k d ə b ʁ ə t a ɲ
s e ɛ t y n ɡ ʁ a m i n e s ɛ s b i t ø n i v ɛ ʁ n a l d ɔ̃ l a b e ʁ j ɔ d v e v e t a t i v v a d ə n ɔ v ɑ̃ b ʁ a v y ɔ̃
l ə v ø a e t e d e v l ɔ b e e e d i t e b a ʁ y b i s ɔ t t
l a b a ʁ ɔ l ɛ t a m ə s j ø v ɑ̃ t ʁ e d e ʁ i k b w a s ɔ̃ b ɔ ʁ s ɔ t n i ʁ ɛ l a m ɑ̃ d m ɑ̃ n y m e ʁ a s ɛ t s ɑ̃ s w a s ɑ̃ t n œ t
ɛ l ɛ ɛ l œ v ʁ d ə ɛ l a ʁ m i t ɛ k t ɛ ʁ n ɛ s t s ɑ̃ s ɔ̃
k ɔ m ɑ̃ t ɛ t v ɔ b ɔ ʁ l ɔ k a l i n e l e m ɑ̃ k ɑ̃ t i l s ə b ʁ ɔ d y i n
i l b a ʁ a n i t t ɔ s e n a ʁ b ʁ n e l e t ɛ l ɑ̃ t m ɑ̃ b e ʁ i ʁ
i l ɑ̃ ʁ ɛ s t a v ɔ ʁ d y i k ɛ l k ə ʁ y i n

k a ʁ ɑ̃ t e œ̃
v ɔ n a v e ʁ ɛ n ɔ̃ d i ɛ l

l e b ʁ ɔ b l ɛ m n ɔ k a n j ɔ n d e t ʁ y s t ʁ a s j ɔ̃ k i a l ɔ̃ t ɛ ʁ m b ø v ʁ ə t ɑ̃ t i ʁ s y ʁ l ə k ɔ ʁ
m ɛ l a b ʁ ɛ s d ə l w a d s ɛ t ɑ̃ t ʁ ə t ɑ̃ k a s e e n ə b ø t ɛ t ʁ ʁ e b a ʁ e

l a s i t e s ə ʁ a d e n ɔ ʁ m ɛ l a b a n b ʁ ɔ̃ s i b a l b ɔ ʁ l e n a k s j ɔ̃ d e n a ʁ m e k ʁ e t j ɛ n
l a m ɔ ʁ ʁ a b i d d ə n ə b ɛ ʁ m ɛ b a ʁ a j œ ʁ b a d ə k ɔ̃ s ɔ l i d e l e ʁ e n y l t a n ɔ b t n y
v a n ɔ̃ l ɔ m d ə t ɔ ʁ n e t y t ʁ ɛ n a k t i t ɑ̃ n a v a ʁ

l œ ʁ v i l b ʁ ɔ̃ s i b a l e t ɛ t a t y a t y k a d ə v n y t ɔ̃ ɡ ʁ
i l ɔ v ʁ d ə d ø s ɑ̃ t ʁ n iː ʁ m ɔ ʁ ɑ̃ b ɔ l ɔ ɲ e a m a ʁ ɔ k

ɔ ɛ l ə v y l n e ʁ ɛ ʁ
s ɔ̃ a ʁ m ɛ l ɛ s i t y e a a s y d d ə ʁ ɛ n

s ɛ t œ v ʁ d ə s j ɑ̃ s t i k s j ɔ̃ a b ɔ ʁ t y n n ɔ v ɛ l l ɛ k t y ʁ d y m a j d d ə l ɑ̃ v d e m y
v ə s y i t a v ɔ ʁ a b l a l a d ɔ k y m ɑ̃ t a s j ɔ̃ d e b ʁ ø v
l e k ɔ̃ d i s j ɔ̃ d ə s ɛ t ɔ b e ʁ a s j ɔ̃ n ə s ɔ̃ b a s ɑ̃ b a n e d ə b ʁ ɔ b l ɛ m
a l ɔ k a n j ɔ̃ l a s e ʁ i y t i l i n d e n e l e m ɑ̃ d ə s j ɑ̃ s t i k s j ɔ̃
l a ʁ e v j ɔ̃ k ɔ̃ b ʁ ɑ̃ l e v i l d ɛ l v a d i d a s i d i b ɛ n ɔ ʁ e a n ɛ m ɔ ʁ
m ɛ s ɔ̃ t ɑ̃ d ə v ø a v a l ɑ̃ s ɛ t y n n ɔ v ɛ l t w a l i m i t e

b ɔ ʁ œ̃ b ɛ i k ɔ m l a t ʁ ɑ̃ s l ə m ɛ s a v ɛ n ɛ b a t ɔ ʁ s e m ɑ̃ t ʁ ɛ v a l ɔ ʁ i n ɑ̃

y n d ɛ ʁ n j ə ʁ ɛ k s b l ɔ ʁ a s j ɔ̃

v ə n ə d i b a

œ̃ n a k w a m a n i l ɛ t y n ɛ ɡ j ɛ ʁ m e d j e v a l s ɔ v ɑ̃ n ɔ m ɔ ʁ t k i s ɛ ʁ v ɛ t a n a b l y s j ɔ̃

s ɛ t ɔ̃ n a v i
t j ɔ̃ n ɑ̃ b ʁ a s t a b ɛ l m ɛ ʁ b l y t a

v ə v ɔ n ɑ̃ k ɔ̃ v y ʁ d i t t ɔ v ɔ ʁ k ɔ m l y i m ɛ t e v ɔ d ə s ɔ̃ k a t e n ə m e b a ʁ n j e b a
